<title level="1" right="Focus 3" pfs="Standard">
[Embrace the Pit](/Spells.aspx?ID=2100)
<actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=721" />
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=561" />
<trait label="Focus" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=511" />
<trait label="Morph" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=657" />
<trait label="Sorcerer" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=148" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 263 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Bloodline**
[Diabolic](/Bloodlines.aspx?ID=22)

<row gap="medium">

 

</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** 1 minute
</row>

</column>

---

Devil horns grow from your skull, and your skin takes on features of the devil responsible for your diabolic bloodline. You gain resistance 5 to fire and [poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=669), and resistance 1 to physical damage (except [silver](/Equipment.aspx?ID=379)).

---
**Heightened (+2)** The resistance to fire and poison increase by 5, and the resistance to physical damage (except silver) by 2.
name: Embrace the Pit
